name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Analytics Engineer with 13+ years of experience in data engineering and analytics, skilled in **SQL**, **dbt**, **dimensional modelling**, and **Data Vault** techniques. Proficient in the **ELT process** and adept with visualization tools such as **Looker**, **Tableau Software**, **Qlik**, and **Power BI**. Experienced in working with cloud data warehousing solutions like **Snowflake** and utilizing version control tools like **Git**.

Exceptional communication skills, fluent in both French and English, and a strong collaborator in an **agile environment**. A self-starter who blend technical expertise with a commitment to delivering high-quality analytics solutions that drive data-informed decision-making.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **SQL** and **dbt** to develop and optimize data models, ensuring compliance with **dimensional modelling** and **Data Vault** methodologies.
Designed and executed robust **ELT processes** for ingesting and transforming data from various sources into **Snowflake**, enabling seamless analysis and reporting.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to foster an **agile environment**, delivering BI solutions with tools such as **Tableau Software**, **Looker**, and **Power BI** that are embedded into existing workflows.
Implemented data visualization best practices, creating interactive dashboards using **Tableau Software** and **Qlik**, facilitating insightful decision-making.
Maintained version control and collaboration through **Git**, ensuring code quality and a streamlined workflow across analytics projects.
Acted as a **self-starter**, driving analytics initiatives independently while demonstrating strong **communication skills** in both **English** and **French** to engage stakeholders effectively.
Introduced advanced metrics and KPIs to projects, leveraging data to tell a compelling story and improve organizational performance.
Enhanced data accessibility by building intuitive reporting solutions that simplified complex data sets into digestible visual formats, leading to an average increase of **30%** in user engagement.
Trained and mentored junior analysts on **dimensional modelling** and analytics best practices, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
Extracted insights from data trends and anomalies, utilizing analytical tools and methodologies that resulted in identifying cost-saving opportunities of up to **15%** year-over-year.

Utilized **SQL** and **dbt** for transforming and modeling datasets, ensuring data integrity and accessibility for analysis.
Implemented **dimensional modelling** and **Data Vault** techniques to optimize data warehouse architecture, achieving a **50%** improvement in query performance.
Streamlined the **ELT process** for financial data ingestion, enhancing efficiency and reducing processing time by **30%**.
Collaborated in an **agile environment**, driving iterative improvements and adapting to changing requirements with agility and precision.
Leveraged **Git** for version control, ensuring seamless collaboration within the analytics team and maintaining code integrity across projects.
Created impactful data visualizations using **Looker**, **Tableau Software**, **Qlik**, and **Power BI**, presenting findings to stakeholders and enhancing decision-making processes.
Executed data extraction and loading processes to **Snowflake**, reducing data retrieval times by **25%** for end-users.
Communicated complex analytical insights effectively in both **French** and **English**, fostering collaboration with diverse teams and stakeholders.
Demonstrated self-starter qualities by proactively identifying opportunities for data optimization and contributing to team goals.

Utilized **SQL** and **dbt** for data modeling and transformations, ensuring robust **dimensional modeling** and effective **Data Vault** techniques to enhance data reliability and accessibility.
Executed the **ELT process** to stream data efficiently from source systems into **Snowflake**, supporting fast query responses and dynamic reporting.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **agile environment** to design and implement data visualizations using **Looker**, **Tableau Software**, **Qlik**, and **Power BI**, providing stakeholders with actionable insights based on real-time data.
Versioned source control using **Git** to manage changes and maintain a robust workflow, enabling efficient collaboration and code quality assurance.
Demonstrated exceptional **communication skills** while effectively collaborating with diverse teams to convey complex data findings in a clear manner.
Applied data governance practices, ensuring adherence to security and compliance protocols, which increased data trustworthiness by **30%**.
Took initiative as a **self-starter** in identifying data needs and developing solutions that drove business growth, resulting in a **15%** increase in operational efficiency.
Leveraged proficiency in both **French** and **English** to serve a diverse range of clients and stakeholders, facilitating smoother communication and understanding across teams.
